mapper.select: SELECT SHOP_BUY.BUY_CODE , BUY_TOTAL_PRICE , TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') BUY_DATE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , BUY_CNT , BUY_PRICE , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM SHOP_BUY, SHOP_ITEM, SHOP_BUY_DETAIL, ITEM_IMG WHERE SHOP_BUY.BUY_CODE = SHOP_BUY_DETAIL.BUY_CODE AND SHOP_BUY_DETAIL.ITEM_CODE = SHOP_ITEM.ITEM_CODE AND SHOP_ITEM.ITEM_CODE = ITEM_IMG.ITEM_CODE AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberID} AND IS_MAIN = 'Y' ORDER BY BUY_DATE DESC
